definitions.definition: A fluid consisting of a mixture of refined petroleum hydrocarbons , primarily consisting of octane , commonly used as a motor fuel .
A motor vehicle powered by petrol (as opposed to diesel ).

main_definition: ( Commonwealth , excluding Canada ) A fluid consisting of a mixture of refined petroleum hydrocarbons , primarily consisting of octane , commonly used as a motor fuel .
secondary_definitions: ( informal ) A motor vehicle powered by petrol (as opposed to diesel ).
